ticket.title: Can't file a ticket on Rails Guides
ticket.original-body:
At the top of http://guides.rubyonrails.org/contribute.html it says You can track the overall effort at the Rails Guides Lighthouse but the link to lighthouse (https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/16213-rails-guides/tickets) displays Oops! : This is not a public project If you think this is an error, please contact one of the administrators of this site. You can also log in with another profile.
The actual bug report I wanted to file: http://edgeguides.rubyonrails.org/layouts_and_rendering.html#using-partials where it says: To render a partial as part of a view, you use the render method within the view, and include the :partial option: followed by a number of examples that all do *not* include the :partial option.

At the top of http://guides.rubyonrails.org/contribute.html it says You can track the overall effort at the Rails Guides Lighthouse but the link to lighthouse (https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/16213-rails-guides/tickets) displays Oops! : This is not a public project If you think this is an error, please contact one of the administrators of this site. You can also log in with another profile.
The actual bug report I wanted to file: http://edgeguides.rubyonrails.org/layouts_and_rendering.html#using-partials where it says: To render a partial as part of a view, you use the render method within the view, and include the :partial option: followed by a number of examples that all do *not* include the :partial option.
ticket.original-body-html:
At the top of http://guides.rubyonrails.org/contribute.html it says

You can track the overall effort at the Rails Guides Lighthouse

but the link to lighthouse (https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/16213-rails-guides/tickets) displays

Oops! : This is not a public project
If you think this is an error, please contact one of the administrators of this site. You can also log in with another profile.

The actual bug report I wanted to file:

http://edgeguides.rubyonrails.org/layouts_and_rendering.html#using-partials

where it says:

To render a partial as part of a view, you use the render method within the view, and include the :partial option:

followed by a number of examples that all do not include the :partial option.

version.title: Can't file a ticket on Rails Guides

version.body:
I think that's an old link that should be removed.
Now, you can fix/contribute to the docs directly in the [docrails](https://github.com/lifo/docrails/ "docrails") repo at GitHub. Check out http://guides.rubyonrails.org/contribute.html#how-to-contribute
version.body-html:
I think that's an old link that should be removed.

Now, you can fix/contribute to the docs directly in the docrails repo at GitHub. Check out http://guides.rubyonrails.org/contribute.html#how-to-contribute
version.title: Can't file a ticket on Rails Guides

version.body: Can you patch that in docrails please. Guides can be patched in docrails directly :).
version.body-html: Can you patch that in docrails please. Guides can be patched in docrails directly :).
